title: WiFi Controller App
description: This is a Flutter application that allows you to control a car using WiFi (TCP/IP sockets)
long_description: WiFi Car Controller is a Flutter-based application that enables real-time wireless control of a car over a WiFi network, offering both joystick and button interfaces, adjustable speed, and seamless integration with ESP8266/ESP32 hardware for smooth and precise navigation.

title: Bluetooth Controller App
description: This is a Flutter application that allows you to control a car using Bluetooth
long_description: This is a Flutter application that allows you to control a car using Bluetooth. The app provides different control options including joysticks and buttons for forward, backward, left, and right movements. It is designed to work with Bluetooth-enabled hardware such as Arduino and HC-05 modules.
